mosinstall.name: VirtueMart Recently Viewed Products Module
mosinstall.author: Marty Tennison
mosinstall.description: This module will display a list of the most recently viewed product. It stores the information in a cookie on the users computer so that when the user returns the information will still be there.

param.name: use_s_desc
param.label: Use Product Short Description
param.description: If yes, the product short description will be saved in the cookie contents. Use this only if you intend to display the short description as this will greatly increase the size of the cookie contents. remember, cookies are limited to 4k in size.

param.name: s_desc_length
param.label: Maximum Short Description Length
param.description: This setting defines the maximum length of the short description. If your short description is more than this number, it will be truncated for display.

param.name: cookie_expire
param.label: Cookie Experation Time
param.description: This determines (in seconds) how long the cookie will remain active on the users computer. 1 day = 86400 seconds. Default is 1 year.

param.name: num_prod_display
param.label: Number or products to display
param.description: How many products (rows) should be returned. Default: 9

param.name: num_prod_remember
param.label: Number or products to remember
param.description: How many products should be saved in the cookie. Default: 25

param.name: no_products_msg
param.label: No products message
param.description: If the user has not viewed any products yet, this text will be displayed.

param.name: image_path
param.label: Relative Image Path
param.description: The path to your images directory. This is relative to http root.

param.name: pre_content_template
param.label: Pre Content Template
param.description: This text is appended just BEFORE the items are displayed. Common uses would be HTML marked for display formating. ie. div, ol, ul etc.

param.name: content_template
param.default: {name}
param.label: Content Template
param.description: This is where the formating of the output occurs. Use any HTML code you wish. The following variables are replaced with actual values during runtime. {link_url}, {image_path}, {full_image}, {thumb_image}, {name}, {s_desc}. If you loose the default value or mess it up just delete all contents of this field to get it back.

param.name: post_content_template
param.label: Post Content Template
param.description: This text is appended just AFTER the items are displayed. Common uses would be HTML marked for display formating. ie. /div, /ol, /ul etc.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
